meanings.sent1: The detective found an unexamined clue at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: The unexamined report contained errors that went unnoticed.
meanings.sent3: The unexamined cake recipe led to a disastrous baking attempt.
meanings.sent4: Her unexamined decision to skip class resulted in missed important information.
meanings.sent5: The unexamined package turned out to be a surprise gift from a friend.

meanings.sent1: The unexamined evidence was crucial in solving the case.
meanings.sent2: His unexamined assumptions led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The unexamined proposal was quickly dismissed by the team.
meanings.sent4: Their unexamined beliefs shaped their worldview without question.
meanings.sent5: An unexamined decision can sometimes lead to unexpected outcomes.
